name: Factorio Server
longDescription:
Factorio is a game in which you build and maintain factories. This is the official headless server for hosting multiplayer games.

Features include:

  • Automatic save management
  • Mod support
  • RCON for remote administration
  • Scenario support
  • Whitelisting and banlisting
  • Admin management
  • Automatic updates

The server runs in a Docker container with proper permission handling and data persistence.
description: Official Factorio game server for hosting multiplayer games
